channel.title: Vestibule :: Suggestions for "Improving the community: contribution without commits"
channel.description: A list of all suggestions made for "Improving the community: contribution without commits"

item.title: Suggestion from the proposer
item.description: Its actually not less about processes themselves, but more about what kinds of involvements are possible, which ones fit for you and how easy (or sometimes hard) it can be to participate.

item.title: Suggestion from Vassilis Rizopoulos (@)
item.description: This reads like what I would describe about the process to organize EuRuKo!
